ai-patthana19.15:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in SN 45.)
ai-patthana19.15:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to diversity of principles externally.
ai-patthana19.15:5.1_0: Tamed on the support for the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
ai-patthana19.15:6.1_0: Nor do you take pleasure in the dimension of infinite consciousness and the support for the perception that arises dependent on the basis for two conditions.
ai-patthana19.15:7.1_0: for the sake of the six grounds ...
